member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Http.IMemoryPool.AllocSegment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Acquires a sub-segment of a larger memory allocation. Used for async sends of write-behind buffers to reduce number of array segments pinned
member.param: The smallest length of the ArraySegment.Count that may be returned
member.returns: An array segment which is a sub-block of a larger allocation

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Http.IMemoryPool.FreeSegment(System.ArraySegment{System.Byte})
member.summary: Frees a sub-segment of a larger memory allocation produced by AllocSegment. The original ArraySegment must be frees exactly once and must have the same offset and count that was returned by the Alloc. If a segment is not freed it won't be re-used and has the same effect as a memory leak, so callers must be implemented exactly correctly.
member.param: The sub-block that was originally returned by a call to AllocSegment.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Http.ISocketOutput
member.summary: Operations performed for buffered socket output
